acme.util

Class StringMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • acme.util.StringMatcher

  • public class StringMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    A general pattern matcher that can accept, reject, or do nothing. Patterns are regular expressions preceded by a + or - to indicate accept or reject. A matcher query will test the patterns added to the matcher in the order they were added, returning ACCEPT if a positive pattern is matched, REJECT if a negative pattern is matched, or NOTHING is no patterns match.

    new StringMatcher(StringMatchResult.NOTHING, "+.*moo.*", "-.*cow.*")

    accepts all string containing moo, rejects all strings containing cow (but not moo), and does nothing for all other Strings.
